author: Олександр Корицький
comment: Altimeter starts from 425 m, no matter I'm standing in the water on the beach. When climbed to the 12th floor, it shows just 10 m higher. Calibration? How should I guess the correct value, if I'm looking for altitude using this program?

author: Alex Chang
comment: The altitude measurement is not accurate and the calibration is unable to accept negative value.

reply.author: Alessandro Mautone
reply.content: The calibration accepts negative values while the accuracy may depends from the barometric sensor of the device. Have a good day :)

title: The altitude measurement is not accurate.
